title: Test Application Input Validation Controls
description: An IT auditor tests the input validation controls of a custom web application.

tasks.description: Attempt to enter a negative number into a 'quantity' field that should only accept positive integers.
tasks.expected_outcome: The application correctly rejects the input and displays an error message.

tasks.description: Attempt to enter text into a 'zip code' field that should only accept numbers.
tasks.expected_outcome: The application correctly rejects the input.

tasks.description: Attempt to submit a form with a required 'email address' field left blank.
tasks.expected_outcome: The application correctly prevents submission and highlights the required field.
